200.description: Alignment results with percentage and optionally aligned segments.

400.description: Bad Request - The request was malformed or missing required parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication failed or user is not authorized.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server.

post.description: Compares a 'source' document with a 'target' document and returns a percentage alignment, optionally including aligned segments.
This endpoint is used for binary classification tasks where a boolean output is expected.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The interaction ID representing the context for the request.

schema.description: The interaction ID representing the context for the request.

200.description: SSE streaming response with results from multiple tools. The initial response includes a thread ID for continuing the conversation. (`text/event-stream`)

400.description: Bad Request - The request was malformed or missing required parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Authentication failed or user is not authorized.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An error occurred on the server.

post.description: Allows users to ask questions or make queries, which are processed in the context of a specific interaction. Multiple tools provide responses via SSE. A thread ID is returned with the initial query, which can be used to continue posting to the same thread in subsequent queries.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The interaction ID representing the context for the request.

schema.description: The interaction ID representing the context for the request.

parameters.description: The thread ID representing the context for the request.

schema.description: The thread ID representing the context for the request.

200.description: Returns a summary and a list of relevant sources.

post.description: Processes a query and returns a summary along with relevant sources.

200.description: Returns an array of mentions found in the reference texts.

post.description: Finds mentions of a query within a set of reference texts.

200.description: Returns an array of suggested questions.

post.description: Provides a list of suggested questions based on a query and/or context.

text.description: The content of the matching segment in the source document.

range.description: Start and end indices of the segment in the source document.

alignmentPercentage.description: Alignment percentage between the target and source segment.

data.description: The actual data, which can be a Fact[], a transcript, or a string.

outputLanguage.description: The language in which the document will be generated.

additionalInstructions.description: Any additional instructions to be considered during document generation.

identifier.description: A unique identifier for the encounter, essential for tracking and referencing specific patient interactions.

status.description: Indicates the current state of the encounter, crucial for understanding the progression and current state of care.

type.description: The specific type of encounter, providing context about the nature and setting of the patient interaction.

period.description: The time period during which the encounter takes place.

title.description: A readable name for the interaction

startedAt.description: The start date/time of the encounter. (UTC)

endedAt.description: The end date/time of the encounter. (UTC)

templateId.description: The template the live documentation need to use.

time.description: Time range in seconds for transcript type.

name.description: FHIR reference to Text representation of the full name. Ensures the patient is referred by their name in the documentation.

gender.description: FHIR reference to patient gender. Ensures the documentation is written with the correct pronouns.

birthDate.description: FHIR reference to patient birth date.

pronouns.description: FHIR reference to patient extension Individual Pronouns.

summary.description: For guidelines, a summary of the response.

favicon.description: The favicon URL of the source.

type.description: The type of the source (e.g., PDF, Web).

description.description: A brief description of the source.

type.description: The type of mention (e.g., transcript, document).

response.description: General chat response in markdown format.

rewrittenText.description: For document rewrites, the rewritten text in markdown format.

type.description: The type of mention (e.g., transcript, document).

favicon.description: The favicon URL of the source.

type.description: The type of the source (e.g., PDF, Web).

description.description: A brief description of the source.

sourceDocument.description: The content of the source document.

targetDocument.description: The content of the target document.

compareSegments.description: Indicates if segments from the source should be compared with the target.

data.description: The actual data, which can be a Fact[], a transcript, or a string.

templateId.description: The ID of the template that informs on what kind of document is to be generated.

template.description: Template details if the template should be generated during the request. Overrides templateId.

name.description: An optional name for the document.

query.description: The text-based query from the user.

context.description: An array of contexts, such as documents or relevant segments.

sourceIds.description: An array of source IDs to narrow down the search.

assignedUserId.description: A unique identifier for the medical professional.

query.description: The text-based query from the user.

referenceTexts.description: An array of reference texts where the mentions will be searched.

query.description: The text-based query from the user.
query.example: What are the key points from the latest guidelines?

queryContext.description: A specific document or focus context for the query.

focusContexts.description: A list of additional focus contexts or documents.

context.description: The context in which the query is being made.

query.description: The query for which the questions are being generated (optional).

alignmentPercentage.description: Alignment percentage between the source and target documents.

text.description: The content of the matching segment in the source document.

range.description: Start and end indices of the segment in the source document.

alignmentPercentage.description: Alignment percentage between the target and source segment.

properties.description: The type of mention (e.g., transcript, document).

time.description: Time range in seconds for transcript type.

tool.description: The tool providing the response (e.g., guidelines, mentions, general_chat, etc.)

data.description: The response data specific to the tool.

text.description: The content of the matching segment in the source document.

range.description: Start and end indices of the segment in the source document.

isDiarization.description: Separates speakers in a single channel

text.description: The content of the target document segment.

range.description: Start and end indices of the segment in the target document.
